network
Class Protocol

java.lang.Object
  network.Protocol
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProtocolRequest, ProtocolResponse
 class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of constants and utility methods used by the 'Kaskade'-protocol.

Method Detail

isCommandWithParams

protected static boolean isCommandWithParams(java.lang.String cmdName)
Returns true, if the given command allows the use of parameters.

Parameters:
cmdName - the name of the command.
Returns:
true, if the given command allows the use of parameters.

buildBoardString

protected static java.lang.String buildBoardString(Player server,
                                                   GameSituation situation)
Generates a string representation of the game situation according to the 'setup' in an 'initialized'-command.

Parameters:
server - the player that represents the server according to the 'Kaskade'-protocol.
situation - the game situation to reprsent.
Returns:
a string representation of the given game situation.

buildFieldStringForPosition

protected static java.lang.String buildFieldStringForPosition(Player server,
                                                              GameSituation situation,
                                                              Position aPos)
Generates a string representation of a single field within a board as used in 'setup' and 'board'.

Parameters:
server - the player that represents the server according to the 'Kaskade'-protocol.
situation - the game situation the field belongs to.
aPos - the position of the field to represent.
Returns:
a string representation of a single field.
